Sentencas: Protective Zr(Y)O2-delta-based films sputter-deposited onto apatite-type lanthanum silicate ceramics were appraised for potential applications in solid oxide fuel cells with silicate-based solid electrolytes, where the performance may suffer from surface decomposition processes in reducing atmospheres.
Titulo: Protective YSZ-based thin films deposited by RF magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Dense and crystalline coatings were deposited using radio-frequency magnetron sputtering from an yttria-stabilized zirconia target.
Titulo: Protective YSZ-based thin films deposited by RF magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: On the basis of microstructural analysis and profile measurements, a sputtering power of 300 W was selected in order to achieve deposition rates in the range 0.50-0.75 mu m/h.
Titulo: Protective YSZ-based thin films deposited by RF magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The surface morphology studies using an atomic force microscope revealed typical film structures with small (<50 nm) grains.
Titulo: Protective YSZ-based thin films deposited by RF magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The polarization of model electrochemical cells with cermet anodes comprising Ni, yttria-stabilized zirconia and Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta (50:30:20 wt.%), deposited onto the protective zirconia films, was found quite similar to that of copper-zirconia cermets without interlayers, suggesting that the electrochemical reaction is essentially governed by the oxygen anion transfer from zirconia phase and/or hydrogen oxidation in the vicinity of zirconia film surface.
Titulo: Protective YSZ-based thin films deposited by RF magnetron sputtering
